name: Camera
description: The Canon EOS Rebel T6i DSLR Camera, with 18.0 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor and Dual Pixel CMOS AF, is an entry-level DSLR camera that is designed for both beginners and experienced photographers. The Rebel T6i DSLR Camera features a 1.040 Million-dot LCD screen, with the ability to display both stills and movies, and a standard ISO range of 100-12800. The camera has built-in Wi-Fi and NFC connectivity, which allows for wireless connection with compatible devices.
